alert.note: Alert for Coastal Calhoun; Coastal Refugio; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 7:27AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Calhoun, central Victoria and northeastern Refugio Counties through 815 AM CDT... At 726 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Fordtran to near Bloomington to near Tivoli. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Victoria, Port Lavaca, Seadrift, Guadalupe, Point Comfort, Victoria Colony Creek Country Club, Long Mott, Victoria College, Victoria Mall, Green Lake, Brentwood Subdivision, Inez, Salem, Telferner, Tivoli, Downtown Victoria, Fordtran, Alamo Beach, Dacosta and Wood Hi. This includes the following highways... US Highway 59 between mile markers 624 and 638. US Highway 77 between mile markers 560 and 576. US Highway 87 between mile markers 808 and 840. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Calhoun; Coastal Refugio; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Victoria
